title: Party eggs
description: This is a fun recipe to make with children and they can be served as part of a kid's party spread.

show.b01ncdlj: I Can Cook on the Go

default: 2 free-range eggs, hard-boiled, peeled, halved lengthways

steps: Carefully remove the yolk from the eggs and put in a bowl. Mash in the salad cream and a little of the toppings.
Spoon the yolk mixture back into the halved eggs and place on a serving plate.
